name: The Sims 3: Dragon Valley
description: Nestled in a distant valley lies a mythical town straight out of tales of lore. Travelers journeying to Dragon Valley will discover a village full of towering and fantastical architecture resting along the banks of a gently flowing river and low-rising hills. Visitors will find a world inhabited by colorful elven Sims deeply rooted in centuries-old traditions, and where baby dragons not only exist amongst the residents, but are also kept as pets.
